rules_text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, goad up to three target creatures that player controls. [i](Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Shout it out!!! Because we're weak and fragile, we'll scream our rage until we break!”[/i]
